Question: In the following three weeks, this person shut himself in his room, where he paced back and forth until he was nearly exhausted.
Hints: Although **** left the cabinet voluntarily, Washington never forgave him for his actions, and never spoke to him again.
In turn, Cosway had Trumbull create a portrait of this person which she kept.
Though the resolutions followed the "interposition" approach of Madison, this person advocated nullification.
